question: I am a type 2 diabetic with readings between 7-9 (fasting). I am on 3- 500mg metformin which really don't seem to do much in terms of bringing my blood sugar down. Are there other proven and safe medications which may work better to stabalize my blood sugar levels. Do you have any suggestions based on your personal experiece or observations of other patiance or relatives.ThanksLen
title: Diabetes medication
